class.rdfs:comment: A trip or journey. An itinerary of visits to one or more places.
class.rdfs:label: Trip

schema:itinerary.rdfs:comment: Destination(s) ( [[Place]] ) that make up a trip. For a trip where destination order is important use [[ItemList]] to specify that order (see examples).
schema:itinerary.rdfs:label: itinerary

schema:offers.rdfs:comment: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event. Use [[businessFunction]] to indicate the kind of transaction offered, i.e. sell, lease, etc. This property can also be used to describe a [[Demand]]. While this property is listed as expected on a number of common types, it can be used in others. In that case, using a second type, such as Product or a subtype of Product, can clarify the nature of the offer.
schema:offers.rdfs:label: offers

schema:partOfTrip.rdfs:comment: Identifies that this [[Trip]] is a subTrip of another Trip.  For example Day 1, Day 2, etc. of a multi-day trip.
schema:partOfTrip.rdfs:label: partOfTrip

schema:provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
schema:provider.rdfs:label: provider

schema:subTrip.rdfs:comment: Identifies a [[Trip]] that is a subTrip of this Trip.  For example Day 1, Day 2, etc. of a multi-day trip.
schema:subTrip.rdfs:label: subTrip
